about_the_game: Myths, mysteries, and… murder? Elijah Reed, a seasoned agent for the Ministry of Mysteries, finds himself embroiled in the most puzzling investigation of his career. This time, he heads to the heart of Greece - Athens - where ancient legends have become a sinister reality. His new partner in this quest is none other than the ancient Greek god Pan. Together they must understand what is driving the harpies mad, stop a new murderous cult, and prevent Medusa from turning everyone to stone. But the deeper they delve into the world of ancient myths, the more questions arise about where legend ends and truth begins.
